languages.text: "Но я должна смотреть ясно и видеть не только свет, но и тени. Мне хочется помнить лишь прекрасную сторону Крудараха, но у него была и темная. Мой мир слишком долго провел в изоляции. Он стал подобен озеру, вода в котором застоялась. Там, где нет движения и обновления, даже сладчайшие порывы жизни пропитываются затхлостью. Кто знает..." {n}Ирлиэт тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "...Кто знает, быть может, не будь этой затхлости, будь наши старшие не столь слепы в своих догматах, а молодые — чуть смелее, может быть... Тогда Крударах был бы жив и сейчас?"

traits.locale_text: "Но я должна смотреть ясно и видеть не только свет, но и тени. Мне хочется помнить лишь прекрасную сторону Крудараха, но у него была и темная. Мой мир слишком долго провел в изоляции. Он стал подобен озеру, вода в котором застоялась. Там, где нет движения и обновления, даже сладчайшие порывы жизни пропитываются затхлостью. Кто знает..." {n}Ирлиэт тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "...Кто знает, быть может, не будь этой затхлости, будь наши старшие не столь слепы в своих догматах, а молодые — чуть смелее, может быть... Тогда Крударах был бы жив и сейчас?"

languages.text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"
languages.original_text: "Но я должна смотреть ясно и видеть не только свет, но и тени. Мне хочется помнить лишь прекрасную сторону Крудараха, но у него была и темная. Мой мир слишком долго провел в изоляции. Он стал подобен озеру, вода в котором застоялась. Там, где нет движения и обновления, даже сладчайшие порывы жизни пропитываются затхлостью. Кто знает..." {n}Ирлиэт тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "...Кто знает, быть может, не будь этой затхлости, будь наши старшие не столь слепы в своих догматах, а молодые — чуть смелее, может быть... Тогда Крударах был бы жив и сейчас?"

traits.locale_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only the beauty of Crudarach, but it had a dark side, too. My world had been isolated for too long. It reminds me of a lake with stagnant water. Where there is no movement and renewal, even the sweetest outbursts of life become steeped in mustiness. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "...Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders been not so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then maybe... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

"But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only the beauty of Crudarach, but it had a dark side, too. My world had been isolated for too long. It reminds me of a lake with stagnant water. Where there is no movement and renewal, even the sweetest outbursts of life become steeped in mustiness. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "...Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders been not so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then maybe... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

languages.text: “但我也必须看清楚，那里不仅有光，也有影子。虽然我希望只能记住克鲁达拉赫的美好，但它也同样有它的阴暗面。我的世界已经与世隔绝了太久，变得像一潭死水一样，没有活力，也没有生机。哪怕是最甜蜜的生命爆发，很快也会飘散出腥臭的味道。谁知道呢……”{n}伊莉耶特重重地叹了口气。{/n}“谁知道呢，如果我们没有停滞不前，如果我们的长老没有盲信教条，如果我们的年轻人没有失去勇气，那么说不定……克鲁达拉赫会依然存在？”
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: “但我也必须看清楚，那里不仅有光，也有影子。虽然我希望只能记住克鲁达拉赫的美好，但它也同样有它的阴暗面。我的世界已经与世隔绝了太久，变得像一潭死水一样，没有活力，也没有生机。哪怕是最甜蜜的生命爆发，很快也会飘散出腥臭的味道。谁知道呢……”{n}伊莉耶特重重地叹了口气。{/n}“谁知道呢，如果我们没有停滞不前，如果我们的长老没有盲信教条，如果我们的年轻人没有失去勇气，那么说不定……克鲁达拉赫会依然存在？”

languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

languages.text: «Pero debo ver con claridad no solo la luz, sino también las sombras. Anhelo recordar únicamente la belleza de Crudarach, pero también tenía un lado oscuro. Mi mundo pasó demasiado tiempo aislado. Como en un lago de agua estancada, no había movimiento ni renovación, e incluso las más dulces expresiones de vida no tardaban en volverse fétidas. Quién sabe...». {n}Yrliet suspira con pesadez.{/n} «Quién sabe, de no haberse dado tal estancamiento, de no haber estado tan cegados nuestros ancianos por su dogmatismo y de no haber carecido de coraje nuestros jóvenes, tal vez... Crudarach seguiría con vida ahora».
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: «Pero debo ver con claridad no solo la luz, sino también las sombras. Anhelo recordar únicamente la belleza de Crudarach, pero también tenía un lado oscuro. Mi mundo pasó demasiado tiempo aislado. Como en un lago de agua estancada, no había movimiento ni renovación, e incluso las más dulces expresiones de vida no tardaban en volverse fétidas. Quién sabe...». {n}Yrliet suspira con pesadez.{/n} «Quién sabe, de no haberse dado tal estancamiento, de no haber estado tan cegados nuestros ancianos por su dogmatismo y de no haber carecido de coraje nuestros jóvenes, tal vez... Crudarach seguiría con vida ahora».

languages.text: 「しかし、私は光だけでなく影もしっかりと見据えなければならない。クルダラの美しさだけを思い出したいものだが、そこには確かに闇の面も存在したのだ。私の世界はあまりにも長い間、孤立していた。淀んだ水の湖のように、動きも再生もなく、生命の最も甘いほとばしりさえもすぐに腐敗してしまった…」{n}ユリエットは大きくため息をつく。{/n}「もし停滞がなく、年長者たちが独断専行で盲目的にならず、若者たちに勇気があれば、もしかしたら…クルダラは今も生きていたのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、私は光だけでなく影もしっかりと見据えなければならない。クルダラの美しさだけを思い出したいものだが、そこには確かに闇の面も存在したのだ。私の世界はあまりにも長い間、孤立していた。淀んだ水の湖のように、動きも再生もなく、生命の最も甘いほとばしりさえもすぐに腐敗してしまった…」{n}ユリエットは大きくため息をつく。{/n}「もし停滞がなく、年長者たちが独断専行で盲目的にならず、若者たちに勇気があれば、もしかしたら…クルダラは今も生きていたのだろうか？」

languages.text: "Doch ich muss klar sehen, nicht nur Licht, sondern auch Schatten. Zu gerne würde ich mich nur an Crudarachs Schönheit erinnern, doch es hatte auch eine dunkle Seite. Meine Welt war zu lange isoliert. Wie in einem See aus stehendem Wasser gab es keine Bewegung, keine Erneuerung, und selbst die süßesten Ausbrüche des Lebens begannen bald zu stinken. Wer weiß ..." {n}Yrliet seufzt tief auf.{/n} "Wer weiß, hätte es keine Stagnation gegeben, wären unsere Ältesten nicht derart blinde Dogmatiker gewesen, hätte unsere Jugend ein wenig Mut gehabt, vielleicht ... Vielleicht wäre Crudarach dann noch immer am Leben?"
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: "Doch ich muss klar sehen, nicht nur Licht, sondern auch Schatten. Zu gerne würde ich mich nur an Crudarachs Schönheit erinnern, doch es hatte auch eine dunkle Seite. Meine Welt war zu lange isoliert. Wie in einem See aus stehendem Wasser gab es keine Bewegung, keine Erneuerung, und selbst die süßesten Ausbrüche des Lebens begannen bald zu stinken. Wer weiß ..." {n}Yrliet seufzt tief auf.{/n} "Wer weiß, hätte es keine Stagnation gegeben, wären unsere Ältesten nicht derart blinde Dogmatiker gewesen, hätte unsere Jugend ein wenig Mut gehabt, vielleicht ... Vielleicht wäre Crudarach dann noch immer am Leben?"

languages.text: « Mais je dois ouvrir grand les yeux, pour voir les ombres aussi bien que la lumière. Même si j'aimerais me remémorer uniquement la beauté de Crudarach, il avait aussi un côté obscur. Mon monde est resté isolé pendant trop longtemps. Comme un lac d'eau stagnante, il n'y avait ni mouvement ni renouveau, et même les éclats de vie les plus doux devenaient rapidement fétides, {n}explique Yrliet avant de pousser un profond soupir.{/n} Qui sait... S'il n'y avait pas eu de stagnation, si nos aînés ne s'étaient pas laissés aveugler par leur dogmatisme et si nos jeunes n'avaient pas manqué de courage, alors peut-être... que Crudarach serait encore en vie ? »
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: « Mais je dois ouvrir grand les yeux, pour voir les ombres aussi bien que la lumière. Même si j'aimerais me remémorer uniquement la beauté de Crudarach, il avait aussi un côté obscur. Mon monde est resté isolé pendant trop longtemps. Comme un lac d'eau stagnante, il n'y avait ni mouvement ni renouveau, et même les éclats de vie les plus doux devenaient rapidement fétides, {n}explique Yrliet avant de pousser un profond soupir.{/n} Qui sait... S'il n'y avait pas eu de stagnation, si nos aînés ne s'étaient pas laissés aveugler par leur dogmatisme et si nos jeunes n'avaient pas manqué de courage, alors peut-être... que Crudarach serait encore en vie ? »

languages.text: "Ama görüşüm açık olmalı. İçinde yalnızca aydınlık değil, gölgeler de olmalı. Crudarach'ı salt güzelliğiyle hatırlamayı arzulasam bile karanlık bir tarafı da olduğunu unutamam. Dünyam çok uzun süre tecritte kaldı. Bir gölün durgun suları misali dünyamda ne bir hareket ne de yenilik yaşandı. En masum yaşam tomurcukları bile kısa süre içinde kokuşmaya yüz tuttu. Kim bilir..." {n}Yrliet derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kim bilir belki o durgunluk olmasaydı, dogmatik düşüncelere kapılan atalarımız bu kadar kör olmasaydı, gençlerimiz cesaretten yoksun olmasaydı... Belki Crudarach bugün bile yaşamla dolu olurdu."
languages.original_text: "But I must see clearly, not only light but also shadows. I yearn to remember only Crudarach's beauty, but it had a dark side, too. My world was isolated for too long. Like a lake of stagnant water, there was no movement or renewal, and even the sweetest outbursts of life soon turned fetid. Who knows..." {n}Yrliet sighs heavily.{/n} "Who knows, had there been no stagnation, had our elders not been so blind in their dogmatism and our youths not lacking in courage, then perhaps... Crudarach would still be alive even now?"

traits.locale_text: "Ama görüşüm açık olmalı. İçinde yalnızca aydınlık değil, gölgeler de olmalı. Crudarach'ı salt güzelliğiyle hatırlamayı arzulasam bile karanlık bir tarafı da olduğunu unutamam. Dünyam çok uzun süre tecritte kaldı. Bir gölün durgun suları misali dünyamda ne bir hareket ne de yenilik yaşandı. En masum yaşam tomurcukları bile kısa süre içinde kokuşmaya yüz tuttu. Kim bilir..." {n}Ygriet, derinden iç çekiyor.{/n} "Kim bilir belki o durgunluk olmasaydı, dogmatik düşüncelere kapılan atalarımız bu kadar kör olmasaydı ve gençlerimiz cesaretten yoksun olmasaydı... Belki Crudarach bugün bile yaşamla dolu olurdu."
